manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, colorful beach ball floating near the top of the train car, casting a soft shadow on the wall.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the metal pole in the middle of the train car, ensuring the background aligns realistically.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the subway interior visible through the doorway with a desert landscape, matching the lighting.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain streaks on the subway car windows, reflecting streetlights with realistic diffusion.
manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a mirror reflection of the man on the opposite wall, respecting perspective and adding blur.
